subject: Sentences (Criminal)
Hockey, Ice
Accidents and Safety
Prisons and Prisoners
lead_paragraph: The former N.H.L. player Rob Ramage was sentenced for a 2003 car crash that killed the ex-Chicago Blackhawks player Keith Magnuson.
snippet: The former N.H.L. player Rob Ramage was sentenced for a 2003 car crash that killed the ex-Chicago Blackhawks player Keith Magnuson.
